alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 8:36AM EST until December 19 at 10:10PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Bradford and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Delaware and Chenango Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. Chenango River At Sherburne affecting Chenango County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York... West Branch Delaware At Walton affecting Delaware County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in New York... Chenango River At Greene affecting Chenango County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chenango River at Sherburne. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Water spreads throughout agricultural lands nearest the river on the West side of Sherburne. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:17 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 5.4 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 945 AM EST.
